website_summaries.verdict: The perfect way to keep excess yarn and accessories organized and out of the way.
pros: Hanging storage includes 6 shelves for yarn and 3 side pockets for patterns and tools
Durable hook-and-loop strap attaches firmly to closet pole and easily holds weight
Spacious, open design lets you see and access all of your yarn quickly
cons: Must be hung, storage shelf can not stand on its own

customer_reviews.title: I love these things
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! As most of my yarn is man made fibers, I don't have to worry about moths and other bugs eating up things they way they can natural fibers- what little I do have in natural fibers has been bagged and sealed. These organizers hang easily on the closet rod and I have three of them, holding about 160 skeins of yarn in various sizes and types. It makes a great display in my craft room with my yarn arranged by color too!
customer_reviews.author: Deb W.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for yarn stash
customer_reviews.text: holds lots of yarn and patterns - just what i needed. I wish the "shelves" had some support but i put some backer board in the slot first to support some of the heavier yarn. The Velcro holder at the top is very strong. Be aware that there are only pockets for patterns/books only on one side - not both.
customer_reviews.author: aputerlady

customer_reviews.title: Holds A LOT of yarn & needles!
customer_reviews.text: My yarn addiction was taking over a closet so I bought this to corral them. This container holds a tremendous amount of yarn and does not snag. My husband did modify it a bit to make it stronger by taking an over the door hook and attaching it to this container. He wanted to be extra sure it did not fall. There are pockets on the side that hold all my pattern books as well as my knitting needles & crochet hooks. This product has freed up so much space & made me so much more organized with my yarn crafts. I have not let a needle or hook since I started using this!
customer_reviews.author: CampGolfEat

customer_reviews.title: ... this is listed as yarn storage but I don't like to play by the rules
customer_reviews.text: So I know this is listed as yarn storage but I don't like to play by the rules. We don't have a ton of linen storage at our house but we do have a giant walk in closet in our master bedroom. I ordered two of these. One I store rolled up bath towels, hand towels, and wash cloths. The other I store bins with a variety of toiletries and personal care supplies. They've held up great, and the pockets along the side are perfect for hiding little treats that you don't want to share with your kids or husband especially since neither has noticed the things have pockets ;)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: CottageCutz 6-Shelf Yarn and Craft Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This product is so handy to have in the closet. I am using mine for all my yarn and craft books and patterns as well as for sorting my clothes.. The pockets are just the right size and I love the fact that it can be removed from the rod by undoing the velcro handle. I will be buying more of these for sure!
customer_reviews.author: ffpaws

customer_reviews.title: Unmet expectations but not terribly disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: As every review has already previously stated, it came with a velcro strap instead of a hook (which kinda seems like false advertisement imo, but who am I to say anything). Each compartment has a sturdy outer edge but the inner basket isn't nearly as sturdy. The side pockets can hold smaller crochet patterns but not full size crochet books like the ultimate crochet bible. I'm not terribly disappointed but I do fell like I spent a little too much for what its worth.
customer_reviews.author: NOPE

customer_reviews.title: Oh! That's where I put it!
customer_reviews.text: I was always looking for something that I forgot where I put it. I love the organization of the compartments. It doesn't take up too much closet space and has handy storage compartments on the side to hold patterns and tools. Helps me keep all my supplies in one area. I will be ordering another one. Once I started filling up the compartments, I just enjoyed not having to look for items that I needed to use. I can organize my yarn and tools for each project that I am working on. Great edition for my new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Mstrish0645

customer_reviews.title: Good Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love my yarn closet organizer. It is a perfect fit for a small space. It will hold quite a bit of yarn. I was really looking forward to using the pockets on the side for loose patterns, but the pockets are too small. A page of paper is 8.5". The pockets are a about a 1/4" smaller, so unusable unless you are fading up your patterns which I didn't want to do. I could have gotten an off one though. All in all for the money, it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my children's closet to lay out their clothes and important items for the week. The pockets on the side come in handy for folders and extra ziplock bags. It attaches with VELCRO to the rod in the closet, not a hanger. Very sturdy, I pack theses things full with everything they need for the day. The only negative is that I did have to reinforce each 'shelf' with cardboard because I was filling it so much it started to sag. I bought two and would buy more if I had the space.
customer_reviews.author: G.Bean

customer_reviews.title: Love mine, and my beautiful cousin in Maine loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Love mine, and my beautiful cousin in Maine loves hers! A must have for yarn and saving space and seeing what all you have. Thank you for a quality product that I can surprise family and friends with!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann J

customer_reviews.title: Great idea.
customer_reviews.text: I think these are really pretty cool. I, of course put way too much stuff in each one so the top has bowed slightly, but the velcro has held them on tight to the clothes rod in the closet. Glad I bought 4 so I could distribute the weight a bit more. The picture shows a hook but the item has velcro which is probably much better.
customer_reviews.author: deborah noland

customer_reviews.title: Very strong velcro collapsible shelves
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my now organized shelves of yarn! Very sturdy, Velcro, that can support the weight of my yarn and my cats who love to get in it and lay in the bottom pockets
customer_reviews.author: StellaLuna

customer_reviews.title: Yarn Storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, always trying to organize my yarn supply and have it visible. This fits the bill. I could use a few more but don't have the room.
customer_reviews.author: lily pea

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was great thank you very much
customer_reviews.text: I use it to put my clothes my shoes staying crocheting yarn’s and stuff I put my clothes in my stuff near my closet so I can make room for my clothes and organize
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Miller

customer_reviews.title: Crafters dream
customer_reviews.text: I’ve recently begun crocheting and it’s become an obsession or passion. I’ve ordered so much yarn and then realized I didn’t have a place to store it. Amazon to the rescue. This craft hanging container is just what I needed. Great value and easy access and installation. Definitely going to share this product with my crafty friends.
customer_reviews.author: raven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for knitters/crocheters!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have bought several of these over the years because I knit and crochet and need storage for my yarn. This works great! I can pack so many skeins of yarn in it, it's unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Beth hostelley

customer_reviews.title: Really good organizer for yarn
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these hanging shelves and they are perfect for my use. I am using them for my yarn.My husband hung them in the garage in an area where there is light but not direct sunlight. I am so happy I bought them and now I can actually see what yarn I have and organized according to colors.
customer_reviews.author: achriste

customer_reviews.title: worked great on our camping trip
customer_reviews.text: Hung this on our popup we take with us camping was great for paper towels, cups, BBQ spices, stuff like that. Folds up nice and small for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ron W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage
customer_reviews.text: Convenient storage for yarn. Easy to hang in the closet. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Trudy A. Connors

customer_reviews.title: Is not what is advertised or shown.
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive what was advertised. There is no hook on top, a velcro flap instead making it harder to access. Also no flaps on side for items either.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful...cleans up clutter
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 of these...they are great in my walk in closet..for shoes, slippers, small purses. Really helped organize my closet. I also use them in my craft closet. Neat, clean, easy to see exactly what I am looking for. Just wish they came in other colors....like RED or pink
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing my yarn. . Better vision of colors and styles of yarn I have in my stash. Everything is at eye level. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy organizer
customer_reviews.text: Nice organizer for any kraft items , and holds a good amount of weight .
customer_reviews.author: Tom.V

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it's perfect for my yarn and crafts. I may need another soon because when it's so neatly put away and out of sight I buy more projects lol
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be sewn together with stronger thread
customer_reviews.text: After having this for a few weeks the left bottom corner has ripped out at the bottom. Should have sewed the small hole in it first when I seen it before putting any yarn in it
customer_reviews.author: Barb Gruhl

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's not as sturdy as I thought it would be and the velcro is a bit weak.
customer_reviews.author: Darling Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and durable, perfect to store my yarn. I bought three of them and could probably use a couple more. :) Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: What a great organizer. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a great organizer. It holds so much yarn & other craft items & love the side pockets too. It is a breeze to use, just strap the closet bar & you're good to go. If I had more closet space I would buy another of these. I wouldn't mind however if it came in some other colors though, but that is the only complaint I have.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my yarn and it's perfect do I bought another. Love it. The side pockets hold hooks and books
customer_reviews.author: doodlemom

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great storage, but the yarn can be a bit hard to see inside the black cubbies.
customer_reviews.author: Paleo Petlover

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than I thought, but very handy to keep loose skeins/balls of yarn in. A skein fits in just as the picture shows. Not sure I would it load it up with books because of their weight. It seems made for light weight duty. And hanging on normal clothes rod, it hangs almost to floor.
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy junk.
customer_reviews.text: These things are usually flimsy. I don't know how they get the shelves to look straight & sturdy in the photos while fully loaded with stuff. Pretty much junk but it was cheap enough I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing your yarn and putting your patterns with your project.
customer_reviews.text: Okay... granted I need about fifteen of these to fully organize my yarn stash but it really does work well! It's big enough to hold all the yarn for a complete afghan project plus your patterns and a bit more so there ya go.
customer_reviews.author: Dva

customer_reviews.title: It’s better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It hold a lot more weight then I expected it to hold. It’s easy to install and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E. Jessup

customer_reviews.title: Great for yarn storage.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to stash my yarn, and I love it. I purchased this yarn organizer three weeks ago, and I’m very happy with the product. I was able to organize and store my yarn in a manner that helps keep my yarn and projects neat.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage!
customer_reviews.text: Organized my yarn and saved me so much room and now I can find my colors and know how much I have. I am going to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Busyh

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!! I can fit about 6-8 skeins of ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great!! I can fit about 6-8 skeins of yarn in each cubby and I love the pockets on the side! The item pictured shows it hangs by a hook but the one I received is fabric and Velcro (about 3-4 inches long) that wraps around the wooden/metal rod (which I personally think is better)
customer_reviews.author: Useful Critic

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this do to the fact it does not stand on the floor. You have to hang it up and I can't hang it up so I don't like it

customer_reviews.title: Yarn Holder - should work fine!

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice product. The cubes are not as large as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. The cubes are not as large as I expected, so I still have yarn in boxes. I like however so I may get a couple more.

customer_reviews.title: Useful and sturdy product for my Yarnscape/Craftroom.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it.....I used the product to hold my yarn and pattern books.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not see in the description that it had to be hung in a closet. I wanted a standalone storage for my massive amounts of yarn. I will look further for something to meet my needs. I will make due with this
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great for yarn storage - good for storing other items as well
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a better yarn organizer! Fits easily in a closet and i can see all my yarn easily and quickly. A great way to store the "stash" until the right pattern comes along to use the leftovers from other projects. So happy I bought two of these!

customer_reviews.title: My yarn finally has a proper home!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my yarn and they are great. Have enough structure for my needs. Have three of these hanging in various closets, helping me organize my huge yarn stash. Good price for what you're getting.

customer_reviews.title: Upsetting

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for all her yarn
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter as a gift last year. It's perfect for all her yarn. Very nice. She wants another one as her collection is getting even bigger.

customer_reviews.title: and what's best is I can see my skeins

customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time as promised. This organizer hangs beautifully, but the side pockets are upside when it' hanging. It's practically useless for what I'm using it for as the pockets do not hold all my crochet magazines and extra items. Not worth the effort to return.

customer_reviews.text: Way too small for storing yarn. I use high quality yarn, very hard to put more than a few in each section.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my crochet habit
customer_reviews.text: Very well made for the price. I'm actually using it to store my surplus of yarn, patterns, etc and it holds it all quite nicely. I can't speak to how well it would hold other various items. The only regret I have is that I should have bought 2 of them!

customer_reviews.title: Works great for keeping supplies or shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I've hung this in my closet, put all my needle felting supplies and there is still room! works great :)

customer_reviews.title: As described do not expect this to hold a lot ...

customer_reviews.text: Wasn't really what I needed. More of added storage in your closet but to much yarn will make t cave.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these. Bought four and they hold my yarn so well and easy access to get to. Fit in my closet perfectly. Plan on buying more.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased three to hang side by side in an empty closet and they are excellent.

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for organizing my yarn and craft supplies
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these for my closet. They are perfect for organizing my yarn and craft supplies. I am soooo glad I ordered them! I wasn't so sure about the velcro holding the weight wrapped around the closet rod; I secured them by hammering 2 nails into each of them!

customer_reviews.text: I have my entire collection of yarn, needles, and books sorted and hanging in my closet now using this system and it comes in really handy! This works much better than the cluttered boxes and plastic bins I've used in the past.

So you pay seventeen and change and receive the eight dollar and change item.

product_meta.title: Innovative Home Creations Colonial 4850-BLK 6-Shelf Yarn and Craft Organizer, 48 by 11 by 11-Inch, Black
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1Organize yarn and crafts compactly in the same storage space! Hangs from a standard-sized closet rod. Reinforced shelf support resists sagging. This package contains one 48x11x11 inch yarn and craft organizer with six cubbies and side pockets. Imported.
feature_bullets: Organize yarn and crafts compactly in the same storage space! Hangs from a standard-sized closet rod
This package contains one 48x11x11 inch yarn and craft organizer with six cubbies and side pockets
